phrs.translation: 感叹的, 叫喊的, 感叹句
感叹音调, 感叹音高

sentences.sentence: The study on exclamatory sentences is less than that of the other three types.
sentences.translation: 与前三者不同的是，感叹句的研究到目前为止还比较少见。

sentences.sentence: When the local people spoke about the years of one hundred all of them appeared an especially mystery and exclamatory expression.
sentences.translation: 当地人说到100年的时候，很神秘惊叹的表情。

sentences.sentence: When the local people spoke about the years of one hundred, all of them appeared an especially mystery and exclamatory expression.
sentences.translation: 当地人说到100年的时候，很神秘惊叹的表情。
